## jx delete addon gitea

Deletes the gitea addon

### Synopsis


Deletes the gitea addon

```
jx delete addon gitea
```

### Examples

```
  # Deletes the gitea addon
  jx delete addon gitea
```

### Options

```
  -p, --purge            Removes the release name from helm so it can be reused again (default true)
  -r, --release string   The chart release name (default "gitea")
```
